about_the_game:
The demo was released in August of 2020, and although as of 2023 I have started the project over, it is still a good representation of what to expect with the final release of the game, albeit there's been a major change to the cast of characters in Chapter One so I can actually get this game shipped some time this decade :)

As a solo developer, it will take some time to complete development. My current goal is to release Silhouette: Chapter One in early 2024, however, there's a good chance I will miss hitting this release date. Ultimately it will release when it's done.

Silhouette is currently a side project for me, meaning that I work on it when I need a break from my main project.

"It's like an old-school Point and Click Adventure game in a First Person perspective".


Initially, Silhouette will only be available in English. Currently, the game will only run on windows, though I would like to create a Mac and Linux port in the future.

content_descriptors.notes:
Although Silhouette has not been rated by any software ratings board, It is intended for Mature Audiences (17+) due to depictions of the following:
Intense Cartoon Violence
Blood and Gore
Sexual Violence
Alcohol Reference
Mild Language

  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 580 or AMD Radeon HD 8990 and better

short_description: Explore Silhouette: Chapter One - A First-Person, Story-Driven Mystery Adventure. Assume the role of Jim Grayson, an unwavering homicide detective hot on the trail of a disturbing serial killer with confusing motives.
